Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1967...
Released by Philadelphia on 3/2/1967...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1967 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Los Angeles to Minnesota on 7/7/1969 (Going to LA: SS D. Campbell. Going to MIN: CF M. Rivers, C T. Simmons, RF R. Zisk)...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1971, off Fred Scherman (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1971, off Tom A. Murphy (DET)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1971...
Injured on 6/8/1972 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1973...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1975...
